name: banka
description: Svas - Banka challenge - A core Banking Solution Product (UI Only)

scripts.test: npm run droptest && npm run createtest && npm run addadmintest && NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register --timeout 3000 server/test/*.js --exit
scripts.build: npm run clear && babel server --out-dir build
scripts.start: npm run create && npm run addadmin && nodemon --exec babel-node server/server.js
scripts.create: node server/dbcommands createUserTables && node server/dbcommands createAccountTables && node server/dbcommands createTransactionTables
scripts.createtest: NODE_ENV=test node server/dbcommands createUserTables && NODE_ENV=test node server/dbcommands createAccountTables && NODE_ENV=test node server/dbcommands createTransactionTables

author: shalu chandwani
